verses.verse: Behold <WH3117>, a day of Jehovah <WH3068> cometh <WH935>, when thy spoil <WH7998> shall be divided <WH2505> in the midst of thee <WH7130>.

For I will gather <WH622> all nations <WH1471> against Jerusalem <WH3389> to battle <WH4421>; and the city <WH5892> shall be taken <WH3920>, and the houses <WH1004> rifled <WH8155>, and the women <WH802> ravished <WH7901>; and half <WH2677> of the city <WH5892> shall go forth <WH3318> into captivity <WH1473>, and the residue <WH3499> of the people <WH5971> shall not be cut off <WH3772> from the city <WH5892>.
Then shall Jehovah <WH3068> go forth <WH3318>, and fight <WH3898> against those nations <WH1471>, as when <WH3117> he fought <WH3898> in the day <WH3117> of battle <WH7128>.

And his feet <WH7272> shall stand <WH5975> in that day <WH3117> upon the mount <WH2022> of Olives <WH2132>, which is before <WH6440> Jerusalem <WH3389> on the east <WH6924>; and the mount <WH2022> of Olives <WH2132> shall be cleft <WH1234> in the midst <WH2677> thereof toward the east <WH4217> and toward the west <WH3220>, and there shall be a very <WH3966> great <WH1419> valley <WH1516>; and half <WH2677> of the mountain <WH2022> shall remove <WH4185> toward the north <WH6828>, and half <WH2677> of it toward the south <WH5045>.

And ye shall flee <WH5127> by the valley <WH1516> of my mountains <WH2022>; for the valley <WH1516> of the mountains <WH2022> shall reach <WH5060> unto Azel <WH682>; yea <WH5127>, ye shall flee, like as ye fled <WH5127> from before <WH6440> the earthquake <WH7494> in the days <WH3117> of Uzziah <WH5818> king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063>; and Jehovah <WH3068> my God <WH430> shall come <WH935>, and all the holy ones with thee <WH6918>.
And it shall come to pass in that day <WH3117>, that there shall not be light <WH216>; the bright <WH3368> ones shall withdraw themselves <WH7087>:

but it shall be one <WH259> day <WH3117> which is known <WH3045> unto Jehovah <WH3068>; not day <WH3117>, and not night <WH3915>; but it shall come to pass <WH6153>, that at evening time <WH6256> there shall be light <WH216>.

And it shall come to pass in that day <WH3117>, that living <WH2416> waters <WH4325> shall go out <WH3318> from Jerusalem <WH3389>; half <WH2677> of them toward the eastern <WH6931> sea <WH3220>, and half <WH2677> of them toward the western <WH314> sea <WH3220>: in summer <WH7019> and in winter shall it be <WH2779>.
And Jehovah <WH3068> shall be King <WH4428> over all the earth <WH776>: in that day <WH3117> shall Jehovah <WH3068> be one <WH259>, and his name <WH8034> one <WH259>.

All the land <WH776> shall be made like the Arabah <WH6160>, from Geba <WH1387> to Rimmon <WH7417> south <WH5045> of Jerusalem <WH3389>; and she shall be lifted up <WH7213>, and shall dwell <WH3427> in her place <WH4725>, from Benjamin <WH1144>'s gate <WH8179> unto the place <WH4725> of the first <WH7223> gate <WH8179>, unto the corner <WH6434> gate <WH8179>, and from the tower <WH4026> of Hananel <WH2606> unto the king <WH4428>'s wine-presses <WH3342>.
And men shall dwell <WH3427> therein <WH2764>, and there shall be no more curse; but Jerusalem <WH3389> shall dwell <WH3427> safely <WH983>.

And this shall be the plague <WH4046> wherewith Jehovah <WH3068> will smite <WH5062> all the peoples <WH5971> that have warred <WH6633> against Jerusalem <WH3389>: their flesh <WH1320> shall consume away <WH4743> while they stand <WH5975> upon their feet <WH7272>, and their eyes <WH5869> shall consume away <WH4743> in their sockets <WH2356>, and their tongue <WH3956> shall consume away <WH4743> in their mouth <WH6310>.

And it shall come to pass in that day <WH3117>, that a great <WH7227> tumult <WH4103> from Jehovah <WH3068> shall be among them <WH2388>; and they shall lay hold every one <WH376> on the hand <WH3027> of his neighbor <WH7453>, and his hand <WH3027> shall rise up <WH5927> against the hand <WH3027> of his neighbor <WH7453>.

And Judah <WH3063> also shall fight <WH3898> at Jerusalem <WH3389>; and the wealth <WH2428> of all the nations <WH1471> round about <WH5439> shall be gathered together <WH622>, gold <WH2091>, and silver <WH3701>, and apparel <WH899>, in great <WH3966> abundance <WH7230>.

And so shall be the plague <WH4046> of the horse <WH5483>, of the mule <WH6505>, of the camel <WH1581>, and of the ass <WH2543>, and of all the beasts <WH929> that shall be in those <WH1992> camps <WH4264>, as that plague <WH4046>.

And it shall come to pass <WH3498>, that every one that is left of all the nations <WH1471> that came <WH935> against Jerusalem <WH3389> shall go up <WH5927> from <WH1767> year <WH8141> to year <WH8141> to worship <WH7812> the King <WH4428>, Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, and to keep <WH2287> the feast <WH2282> of tabernacles <WH5521>.

And it shall be <WH4940>, that whoso of all the families of the earth <WH776> goeth not up <WH5927> unto Jerusalem <WH3389> to worship <WH7812> the King <WH4428>, Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, upon them there shall be no rain <WH1653>.

And if the family <WH4940> of Egypt <WH4714> go not up <WH5927>, and come <WH935> not <WH4046>, neither shall it be upon them; there shall be the plague wherewith Jehovah <WH3068> will smite <WH5062> the nations <WH1471> that go not up <WH5927> to keep <WH2287> the feast <WH2282> of tabernacles <WH5521>.
This shall be the punishment <WH2403> of Egypt <WH4714>, and the punishment <WH2403> of all the nations <WH1471> that go not up <WH5927> to keep <WH2287> the feast <WH2282> of tabernacles <WH5521>.

In that day <WH3117> shall there be upon the bells <WH4698> of the horses <WH5483>, HOLY <WH6944> UNTO JEHOVAH <WH3068>; and the pots <WH5518> in Jehovah <WH3068>'s house <WH1004> shall be like the bowls <WH4219> before <WH6440> the altar <WH4196>.

Yea <WH5518>, every pot in Jerusalem <WH3389> and in Judah <WH3063> shall be holy <WH6944> unto Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>; and all they that sacrifice <WH2076> shall come <WH935> and take <WH3947> of them <WH1310>, and boil therein <WH3117>: and in that day there shall be no more a Canaanite <WH3669> in the house <WH1004> of Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>.
